#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

#define SIZE 10000

int boxes[SIZE];

void printMaxCount() {
	int max = boxes[1];
	int index = 1;
	for (int i = 2; i <= SIZE; i++) {
		if (max < boxes[i]) {
			max = boxes[i];
			index = i;
		}
	}
			
	cout<<index<<" "<<max<<endl;
}
		
int main() 
{	
	
	int T, N, dummy;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--) {
		for (int i = 0; i <= SIZE; i++)
			boxes[i] = 0;
		cin>>N;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
			cin>>dummy;
			boxes[dummy]++;
		}
		printMaxCount();
	}
	return 0;
}
